data.name: Sample - Fidelis EDR - 1.1.0
data.description: Fidelis Endpoint EDR detects endpoint activity in real time and retrospectively so you can accelerate your response and stop adversaries at the point of entry. This connector supports following actions Get Alerts, Get Endpoints, Detete Endpoints, etc

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all alerts or specific alerts from Fidelis EDR based on the input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Alerts

workflows.description: Retrieves information for specific endpoints from Fidelis EDR based on the offset, limit, and other input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Endpoints

workflows.description: Retrieves theIDs of specific endpoints from Fidelis EDR based on the endpoint names you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Endpoint By Name

arguments.title: Fidelis EDR: Get Endpoint By Name

workflows.description: Deletes specific endpoints from Fidelis EDR based on the endpoint IDs you have specified.
workflows.name: Delete Endpoint

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of playbooks and their details from Fidelis EDR.
workflows.name: Get Playbooks

workflows.description: Retrieves details of all Fidelis playbooks and scripts or specific Fidelis playbooks and scripts from the Fidelis EDR based on the input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Playbooks And Scripts

arguments.title: Fidelis EDR: Get Playbooks And Scripts

workflows.description: Retrieves details for a specific playbook from Fidelis EDR based on the playbook ID you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Playbooks Details

workflows.description: Retrieves information on the API version from Fidelis EDR.
workflows.name: Get API version Information

arguments.title: Fidelis EDR: Get API version Information

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all script packages from Fidelis EDR.
workflows.name: Get Script Packages

workflows.description: Retrieves the specificscript packages file from Fidelis EDR and adds this script file to the "Attachment Module" in FortiSOAR based on the script package ID you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Script Packages File

arguments.title: Fidelis EDR: Get Script Packages File

workflows.description: Retrieves the manifest for a specificscript package from Fidelis EDR based on the script package ID you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Script Packages Manifest

arguments.title: Fidelis EDR: Get Script Packages Manifest

workflows.description: Retrieves the metadata for a specificscript package from Fidelis EDR based on the script package ID you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Script Packages Metadata

arguments.title: Fidelis EDR: Get Script Packages Metadata

workflows.description: Retrieves the template for a specificscript package from Fidelis EDR based on the script package ID you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Script Packages Template

arguments.title: Fidelis EDR: Get Script Packages Template

workflows.description: Executes a specific script package on Fidelis EDR based on the script package ID, timeout value, host information, and other input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Execute Script Package

workflows.description: Retrieves the results of a script job from Fidelis EDR based on the job result ID you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Script Job Results

arguments.title: Fidelis EDR: Get Script Job Results

workflows.description: Executes a task (run a script job or a playbook) on Fidelis Endpoint EDR based on the script package IDs and endpoint IDs you have specified.
workflows.name: Execute Task

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all installed Software from Fidelis EDR based on the input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Installed Software

workflows.description: Retrieves a list of all alerts responses from Fidelis EDR based on the input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Alert Responses

workflows.description: Retrieves information for specific endpoints from Fidelis EDR based on the offset, limit, and other input parameters you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Endpoints By Search Query

arguments.title: Fidelis EDR: Get Endpoints By Search Query

routes.name: Start-> Get Endpoints By Search Query

workflows.description: Retrieves the results of a script job from Fidelis EDR based on the job ID you have specified.
workflows.name: Get Job Status By Job ID

arguments.title: Fidelis EDR: Get Job Status By Job ID

steps.name: Get Job Status By Job ID

arguments.name: Fidelis EDR
arguments.operationTitle: Get Job Status By Job ID

routes.name: Start-> Get Job Status By Job ID

workflows.description: Executes a task (run a script job or a playbook) on Fidelis Endpoint EDR based on the script package IDs and endpoint IDs you have specified.
workflows.name: Create Custom Task
